TopicTitle: Hat positions on Logitech 3D Pro not registering in Input selection

Articles.Content: In short, I want to configure the IVA camera to a DCS-like method I use with the hat on my joystick, but none of the controls in Input register anything from the hat.  Everything else works, whether steering, throttle, or buttons, but the hat just won't work.  None of the mods I have should be interfering since I've encountered this on every install I've used, whether modded or not.

Answer I just found out by accident: KSP registers the hat as an axis, so you have to set the camera Horizontal and camera Vertical axes to their respective hat "axes".  Note that it doesn't seem to support the 45° axes.
